resources.string: Turn on HDR may get better photo effect
Camera has been disabled because of security policies.
Can\'t connect to the camera. Please make sure to close other apps that may use camera or flashlight.
Do you want to restore camera default settings?
Counting down to take a photo
Permissions denied. You can change them in Settings > Apps.
Low contract may affect Dual camera effects.
Lowlight may affect Dual camera effects.
Too close to object for Dual camera effects.
Do not move device during HDR capturing
Mount USB storage before using the camera.
Touch and hold object on screen to enable object tracking.
Move device to overlap the two lines
Press shutter to start capture 3D panorama
Move device to overlap the two lines
Move device towards your capture direction
Press shutter to start capture panorama
PIP mode does not support continuous shot.
Device temperature is too high,please use the camera later.
Device temperature is too high and camera will exit automatically in 30 seconds. Please try to use it later.
Scroll to view more capture modes
The default storage is full,please release some space or manage the storage options in settings
Single touch face region to make it have beautified effect
Please stop other recording applications before using video camera.
You can say \"%1$s\" or \"%2$s\" to capture a photo
